name: Kana Learning Game

screenshots.caption: You can also guess from the kana

short_description:
This is a game I made a few years ago to help myself learn Japanese hiragana and katakana. Although my studies in the Japanese language never took off, this certainly helped, and the few friends I shared this with have said the same. So I thought I would share it with everyone!

The way it works is simple. You are shown a syllable in the top left corner, and you must click on the button that has the corresponding hiragana or katakana. Comes with various different modes, for different challenges.

You can now control the game with the arrow keys of your keyboard. Also, not reflected in the screenshots above, there is also a button that will highlight the correct answer for you if you are feeling stuck. When you use this button, your current guess will not count towards your score in any way.

If anybody finds any bugs, please let me know, and I will do my best to fix it in a timely manner!
summary: A game to help learn Japanese hiragana and katakana
